title.rendered: Level Up your Mentorship Relationship with Lucy

content.rendered:
“Our people have access to a wealth of internal experience and expertise at their fingertips.” Lucy Pollard, Global Head of Employee Experience and Engagement at Millennium, offers advice on how to source and maintain a valuable mentorship relationship.

  1. Choose a mentor who you respect and who inspires you.
  2. Be honest about your development needs and career growth.
  3. Maintain a growth mindset.
  4. Action the advice.

excerpt.rendered: “Our people have access to a wealth of internal experience and expertise at their fingertips.” Lucy Pollard, Global Head of Employee Experience and Engagement at Millennium, offers advice on how to source and maintain a valuable mentorship relationship.
